name: SuperCold (AtomHack)
description:
This game is made by me for the GDSG Intrinsic Game Jam Second Edition 2021.

The theme is Communication Difficulties.

Limitation used:

"Inintelligible" (Your game doesn't feature any existing alphabets).

Description:

Supercold is an FPS game where enemies' ping is proportional to your character movement speed, making the effect that time moves slower when you move.
Kill all the enemies  in each level without getting hit to get to the next one.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Rotation
Left Click Button - Shoot

Credits:

Programming: Manuel Carrasco
